name: Knucklehead Trout
book: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.Water Breathing: The trout can breathe only underwater.

actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.Tail: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
